version_description:
• Added support for Secure Release Anywhere™ pull printer groups. Print to a Secure Release Anywhere™ printer group and then release your job to any printer that is a member of the group. It's as easy as printing to the group and releasing from any printer. No need to re-submit your document it will already be available for release at every printer.
• Added 3D Touch quick action to launch directly to the QR Code Scanner from the iOS Home Screen.
• Improved Printer Details to display more Location information where available.
• Improved stability and performance.

• You can now securely release your print job from a printer in app, even if it wasn't submitted using the app.  Simply scan the printers QR code and press "Release Job" to start securely releasing from the printer.
• Improved app stability and other minor fixes.
• Print jobs submitted outside of the app can now be released in-app using stored user credentials.
• Added email printing to the application.  Connect your IMAP email accounts and print email bodies and attachments.  That's right you can print your email bodies directly now with ease!

• Added a print option for spreadsheets that allows you to select between printing all worksheets or just the active worksheet.
• Bug fixes.

• Now you can swipe left or right to scroll through your Photos when in the fullscreen preview.
• Password protected PDF files no longer crash the app.
• Fixed a print error when selecting a file from Documents.

• Support for cloud-based Single Sign-On authentication methods. When enabled by a compatible server, users might be redirected to a third-party web form to enter their credentials.
• Server-side print preview. Mobile devices have limited preview capabilities. This feature, when enabled by a compatible server, lets the app take advantage of the PrinterOn Server's superior rendering capabilities to generate accurate images for the app.
• Updated Google account sign-in to be more secure and comply with new Google restrictions.

• When communicating with PrinterOn Enterprise v4.0.1 and up your "Print History" will now show a list of all jobs submitted by the user from all submission methods and clients.  You can also release any of these print jobs directly from the app.

• Added Ricoh Locked Print Code support. Users can now submit and store preferred user codes for Ricoh devices when using the PrinterOn mobile
apps.
• Photos selection is now done using the native iOS Photos picker. This improves support for iCloud based photos and albums as well as adds access to some previously unavailable albums.
• Bug fix release

• Print History Cache Management. Introduced new cache management capabilities for print history data stored on the device. Users can now choose the amount of data stored, in MB, for print history.
• LDAP/AD Credential Validation. Credentials are now actively validated when entered by the user.
• Improved QR Code Release. The updated flow allows the user to confirm and release their print jobs in many fewer steps.
• Xerox Secure Print Compatibility. Users can now submit and store preferred Secure Print codes for Xerox devices.
• Fixed "Email Setup" not saving Google account logins on iOS 11 devices.
• Users now have the option to disable the Document Cache.

• UI improvements and bug fixes.
• Improved German translations.
• Fixed authentication crash.

• Added support for larger screen devices like the iPhone X, XS, XS Max, and XR.
• Improved security of app communications.
• Improved app launch speed.
• Fixes for user reported issues.

• Now you can easily add user accounts when finding printers or printing to a service.
• More improvements to app performance and stability.
• Performance and reliability improvements.
• Improved authentication with Azure AD to use Safari for increased security.
• Added Arabic language support.
• Fixed an issue where the app was closing on iOS 13 when pressing the print options button in the print preview screen.

• Fixed "Remote Release" of print jobs when talking to newer versions of the service.
• Fixed some layout issues.
